briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate Rozanolixizumab in Study Participants With Generalized Myasthenia Gravis
officialTitle: An Open-Label Extension Study to Evaluate Rozanolixizumab in Study Participants With Generalized Myasthenia Gravis
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety, tolerability and efficacy of additional 6-week treatment cycles with rozanolixizumab in study participants with generalized myasthenia gravis (gMG).

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Treatment-emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From Baseline (Day 1) to End of Study (up to 34 months)
